programme.desc: In 1992 best friends Malik and Eric traverse the city of Chicago, looking to escape the mundaneness of school and the hardships of growing up in public housing. They soon find their unbreakable bond challenged when a tragedy shakes their community.

programme.title: The Pod Generation
programme.desc: In the not-so-distant future, amid a society madly in love with technology, tech giant Pegazus offers couples the opportunity to share their pregnancies via detachable artificial wombs or pods. Rachel and Alvy's wild ride to parenthood begins.

programme.title: Kina & Yuk
programme.desc: Two foxes are preparing to become parents for the first time while global warming is altering the rules for everyone.

programme.title: Metal Shifters
programme.desc: After a meteorite crashes to Earth, a bacteria is released that kills humans on contact. When the bacteria latches on to an iron statue, it brings the statue to life to send it on a destructive rampage.

programme.title: Crazy Racing
programme.desc: An adventurous teenager who is passionate about racing cars, is determined to win back a title that rightfully belongs to his family.

programme.title: 80 for Brady
programme.desc: Four best friends live life to the fullest when they embark on a wild trip to see their hero, Tom Brady, play in the 2017 Super Bowl.

programme.title: The Last Showgirl
programme.desc: When the Las Vegas revue she has headlined for decades announces it will soon close, showgirl Shelly must plan for her future.

programme.title: Dominique
programme.desc: Dominique, a well-trained assassin, flees from her troubled past in an attempt to begin a new life in South America.

programme.title: Strong Fathers, Strong Daughters
programme.desc: When a wealthy businessman learns of his daughter's engagement, he struggles to give up control and trust God with her future.

programme.title: Daddio
programme.desc: A woman gets into a taxi at New York airport and gradually tells the driver about her unfortunate decisions that led to an affair with a married man; the driver also reveals more and more about his life.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: After finding out about her fiance's cheating ways, a pop superstar impulsively marries a total stranger. As forces conspire to separate the unlikely newlyweds, they must soon decide if two people from such different worlds can find true love.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: After finding out about her fiance's cheating ways, a pop superstar impulsively marries a total stranger. As forces conspire to separate the unlikely newlyweds, they must soon decide if two people from such different worlds can find true love.

programme.title: Whale
programme.desc: A young boy is sent to live with his grandparents in a remote indigenous community.

programme.title: Corner Gas
programme.desc: Karen is upset when Emma cuts Brent's hair; Hank promises to stain Lacey's deck.

programme.title: Corner Gas
programme.desc: When a morning radio DJ impersonates Brent on his show, he goes out of his way to prove it's not him; Lacey is upset with her delivery service.

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bash faces an important figure from his past and must solve a public health crisis; hospital administration calls Devi's leadership into question; Mags doubts all of her choices; June is asked to oversee a sensitive procedure.

programme.title: Earthstorm
programme.desc: Scientists turn to a demolitions expert (Stephen Baldwin) for help after learning the instability of the moon threatens all life on Earth.

programme.title: Zodiac: Signs of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: A 2,000-year-old astrology board possesses deadly powers that threaten the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Grizzlie Truth
programme.desc: Superfan filmmaker Kat Jayme investigates the abrupt move of her NBA hometown team, the Vancouver Grizzlies, to Memphis in 2001. Much more than a sore spot, it's an unsolved mystery and possibly a criminal conspiracy.

programme.title: Summer With Hope
programme.desc: Young swimmer Omid trains for a prestigious competition with a new coach and feels responsible for the fate of his family. His alliance with another young man elicits disapproval from people around them.

programme.title: The New Corporation: The Unfortunately Necessary Sequel
programme.desc: Filmmakers Joel Bakan and Jennifer Abbott examine the influence of corporations on every aspect of modern society.

programme.title: Stonehenge Apocalypse
programme.desc: Archaeologists digging near Stonehenge accidentally activate an ancient piece of machinery underneath the bedrock that could end the world.

programme.title: Marcel the Shell With Shoes On
programme.desc: Marcel is a tiny shell who ekes out a colorful existence with his grandmother, Connie. When an Airbnb guest discovers them, the film he posts online brings Marcel millions of fans and a new hope of finding the rest of his long-lost family.

programme.title: Flamin' Hot
programme.desc: Richard Montanez, the son of a Mexican immigrant, was a janitor at Frito Lay when he came up with the idea for Flamin' Hot Cheetos. His creation, inspired by the flavors of his community, revitalizes Frito-Lay and disrupts the food industry.

programme.title: Dark Side of Reality TV
programme.desc: Exploring whether the toddlers and their moms organically outrageous or if producers juice things up for television in the tantrum-filled pageant show.

programme.title: Dark Side of Reality TV
programme.desc: Tyra Banks promises to give aspiring models the tools they needed to succeed in a tough industry; exploring how the show impacted their careers and lives.

programme.title: Heart Eyes
programme.desc: A masked maniac with glowing, red eyes returns every Valentine's Day to slaughter unsuspecting couples. When a cynical ad executive and her hopelessly romantic colleague become the next target, they decide to fight back and end the reign of terror.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Bagman
programme.desc: A father faces a childhood threat that resurfaces suddenly. He battles his deepest fear, not for himself, but to protect his family from the sinister danger.

programme.title: American Fiction
programme.desc: Fed up with the establishment that profits from Black entertainment that relies on tired and offensive tropes, a frustrated novelist writes an outlandish book of his own that propels him to the heart of hypocrisy and the madness he claims to disdain.
